creature.new_creature.name: Araquanid
creature.new_creature.visual: a large, spider-like creature with a glistening blue carapace and eight long legs, each tipped with a razor-sharp claw
creature.new_creature.description: Araquanid prowls the dimly lit caverns, its eight eyes shimmering in the dark as it watches for prey. Water beads on its iridescent carapace, and it moves with a quiet, menacing grace.
creature.new_creature.slain: The Araquanid's many eyes close for the last time as it collapses, twitching, onto the ground.
